raw_comment: I am very surprised that the US has such a low energy usage increase. I would expect the energy to rise drastically through 2000-2024. I was also surprised how low India's energy usage was.
ace_sentences: I am surprised that the energy usage increase in the US is low.
I expected that the energy usage in the US would rise drastically from 2000 to 2024.
I am surprised that the energy usage in India is low.
